abstract: Some participants in Occupy Wall Street protests around the country have formed committees to draft specific proposals to address criticisms that group lacks policy demands and to attract more diverse contingencies.
snippet: Addressing a frequent criticism, some participants in the Occupy Wall Street protests have formed a committee to draft specific proposals.
lead_paragraph: Addressing a frequent criticism, some participants in the Occupy Wall Street protests have formed a committee to draft specific proposals.

headline.main: Protesters Debate What Demands, if Any, to Make
headline.print_headline: Protesters Debate What Demands, if Any, to Make
headline.seo: Occupy Wall Street Trying to Settle on Demands
